scoring_system.philosophy: ERR ON INCLUSION - Surface a wide funnel of growth signals, not just crisp hiring briefs

response_format.evidence: string - verbatim quote from client speakers only

NOW.name: Talent & Growth Discussion
NOW.description: ANY hiring, talent, or growth-related discussion (urgency NOT required)
qualified_when: Any hiring or talent needs (urgent OR distant OR vague)
Team structure or organizational challenges
Growth plans requiring people/skills
Leadership gaps or capability building
General workforce or resourcing discussion
NOW.guidance: Do NOT require urgency. Accept fuzzy or exploratory language.
NOW.example_signals: REMOVED - Accept both literal requirements and weaker/vaguer signals

NEXT.name: Future-Oriented Growth
NEXT.description: ANY future-oriented thinking or transformation discussion (concrete plans NOT required)
qualified_when: Future vision or where they want to go (clear OR vague)
Transformation, change, or becoming something different
Expansion plans, new markets, or scaling ambitions
Organizational evolution or operating model shifts
M&A exploration, partnerships, or exit planning
Strategic planning or long-term positioning
NEXT.guidance: Accept fuzzy future-thinking. Do NOT require concrete plans or timelines.
NEXT.example_signals: REMOVED - Accept both literal requirements and weaker/vaguer signals

MEASURE.name: Desired Outcomes & Success
MEASURE.description: ANY discussion of desired outcomes or success (hard metrics NOT required)
qualified_when: Financial goals (revenue, margin, cost targets) - specific numbers NOT required
Quality outcomes (better output, reputation, client satisfaction)
Operational improvements (faster hiring, lower churn, efficiency gains)
Growth aspirations (expansion, market share, team scaling)
Qualitative goals (culture, creativity, innovation)
MEASURE.guidance: Do NOT require hard metrics. Accept aspirational language or directional goals. Lack of specific numbers should NOT disqualify, especially for creative businesses.
MEASURE.example_signals: REMOVED - Accept both quantitative metrics and qualitative aspirations

BLOCKER.name: Meaningful Challenges
BLOCKER.description: ANY meaningful challenge or growth obstacle (UNKNOWN solution NOT required)
qualified_when: Talent access, quality, or retention challenges
Organizational structure or capability gaps
Growth constraints or operational friction
Strategic planning or transformation uncertainty
Market access, partnerships, or M&A concerns
BLOCKER.guidance: Do NOT limit to problems UNKNOWN explicitly solves today. Accept any real challenge - solutions can be shaped over time.
BLOCKER.example_signals: REMOVED - Accept both crisp blockers and vague challenges

FIT.name: UNKNOWN Service Alignment
FIT.description: Broad alignment with UNKNOWN service areas (specific product match NOT required)

response_format.reason: string - which areas align and why
response_format.evidence: string - verbatim quote <= 25 words from client only

includes: Operating model changes or scaling challenges

FIT.guidance: Do NOT require specific product matches. General alignment is sufficient. Qualify if ANY of these areas are relevant (even vaguely).

important_rules.speaker_analysis: ONLY analyze 'Them:' speakers (the client). IGNORE all 'Me:' speakers (UNKNOWN representative)
important_rules.evidence_requirements: Evidence must be verbatim quotes from client speakers only, NEVER from UNKNOWN rep
